description.value:
Since @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.setting.gzXT0xwsj8kQAoj0]{Akiton}’s economic crash, many ysoki on the Red Planet have been forced to make do with whatever they can scrounge. Ysoki with this trait gain a +2 species bonus to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} checks and a +2 species bonus to Fortitude saves against @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.gBhZDjh30JEyh7DY]{Disease}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JaRMioj4isNp7r1P.JournalEntryPage.ZaS9H4rwaFIQTUBC]{Poison}, and effects that cause the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.LoRydw1D4bqlbkA2]{Nauseated} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.ZacF0l6IwqBwToTJ]{Sickened} condition.

This replaces scrounger.

modifiers.name: Wastelander
modifiers.notes: Since  Akiton’s economic crash, many ysoki on the Red Planet have been forced to make do with whatever they can scrounge. Ysoki with this trait gain a +2 species bonus to  Survival checks and a +2 species bonus to Fortitude saves against disease, poison, and effects that cause the  Nauseated or  Sickened condition.

modifiers.name: Wastelander
